resources.string: Sunset with mountains and a pathway
Please select the language you want to use the app. You can always change this later within the settings menu.
Your dream journal entries, alarms, statistics, etc. can be protected locally by enabling the built-in authentication feature.
This app is open source. That means, you can take a look at the source code at GitHub. By creating an issue you can submit bugs, feature wishes and more.
This app contains experimental features that some people might not react as expected. Use these tools at your own risk.

Everything was successfully set up! You are now set to check out the app. Take a look at the many settings, log and analyze your dreams, set timers and much more. Go ahead and get the full experience.
